org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant

Class PlantConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant.PlantConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MetricsPlantConfiguration

    public class PlantConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for configuring the Plant. Used as the default configuration when none is specified.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int reactorThreadPoolSize
      The size of the thread pool used by reactors.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlantConfiguration()
      Create a plant configuration with a reactor thread pool size of 20.
      PlantConfiguration(int _reactorThreadPoolSize)
      Create a plant configuration.
